title: Energy Sound Effects
description: A collection of energetic sound effects that can serve as a good starting point both for creating energy weapons, spaceship sounds, futuristic atmospheres, and for direct use as they are. The pack contains 102 sounds.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/energy-sound-effects-short-preview

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/4pzxhyoh0dp1fcn/MSE%20-%20Energy%20Sound%20Effects_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The package contains 102 sound effects, including sounds of sparks, activation, deactivation, energy appearance, collapse and failure, battery launch and battery damage, battery recharging, connection, energy whooshes and fly-by sounds, buzzing sounds, and more.


All sound effects are designed with different synthesizers, which means that there is no extraneous noise in them. For some sounds, additional reverb and delay processing has been used.


Bring life to your project, voice the connection, electricity and sparks, force field, charging, activation and deactivation of cybernetic weapons and lightsabers, and recharge your battery.


You can also mix sound effects with each other to create even more sound variations.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 102 sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • perfect for futuristic atmospheres, sci-fi weapons, batteries, barriers, robots, and more


Number of Audio Waves: 102

Number of Audio Cues: 102

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 04 minutes 01 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
